alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 5:15AM CST until December 14 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 600 AM CST. * At 514 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of Tuckers Crossing, or 10 miles east of Ellisville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Wayne County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
